pr_title: Fix WCP-WS Dockerfile so that /ping works.

timeline.message: Add slf4j to pom.xml. Update dom4j version.
Rename StudyMetaData-0.0.1-SNAPSHOT.war to StudyMetaData.war in Dockerfile

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            COPY --from=maven_builder /app/target/StudyMetaData-0.0.1-SNAPSHOT.war /usr/local/tomcat/webapps/StudyMetaData.war
          
          
            
            COPY --from=maven_builder /app/target/StudyMetaData*.war /usr/local/tomcat/webapps/StudyMetaData.war
          
      
    
    
  

Use a wildcard so we don't have to update this if the version changes.
timeline.author: ktkonrad
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -5,5 +5,6 @@ WORKDIR /app/
 RUN mvn package
 
 FROM tomcat:9.0.33-jdk11-openjdk
-COPY --from=maven_builder /app/target/StudyMetaData-0.0.1-SNAPSHOT.war /usr/local/tomcat/webapps/
+# Note that the filename at dest is different from src.
+COPY --from=maven_builder /app/target/StudyMetaData-0.0.1-SNAPSHOT.war /usr/local/tomcat/webapps/StudyMetaData.war

replies.bodyText: Good point. Thanks for the suggestion!
replies.author: kuoyuchi

timeline.message: Use wildcard instead of hard-coded version number in Dockerfile
